author: smuzaffar
body:
For ppc64le and aarch64 archs, DQM offline configuration tests timed out [a] after `1 hour`, see the discussion [b].

This PR proposes to split the DQM offline configuration tests in smaller parts (`10` configurations per test instead of `20`). This should allow to finish each test with in `1h`  ( the time limit we set for IBs and PR tests)

[a] 
- https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/slc7_ppc64le_gcc9/CMSSW_12_0_X_2021-06-30-2300/unitTestLogs/DQMOffline/Configuration#/113-113

[b]
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34186#issuecomment-866795240
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34186#issuecomment-866991769
title: Split dqm configuration tests in smaller parts to avoid timeouts
